item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello I am Francesco Bruno, an Automation and Control Engineer with a passion for robotics and cutting-edge technology. After graduating from Politecnico di Milano, I moved to Lausanne to complete my Master’s thesis at the EPFLâ€™s Reconfigurable Robotics Lab, where I designed a robotics control framework that aimed to bring physical immersione inside virtual environments. This experience deepened my expertise in control systems, human-machine interfaces, 3D simulation, and communication technologies.
